content:
IDatabaseBackupOperations IDatabaseBackupOperations Interface

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.Sql
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.Sql.dll

Represents all the operations for operating on Azure SQL Database database backups.

Edit

In this Article

public interface IDatabaseBackupOperationsPublic Interface IDatabaseBackupOperations

Methods

BeginCreateOrUpdateBackupLongTermRetentionVaultAsync(String, String, String, BackupLongTermRetentionVaultCreateOrUpdateParameters, CancellationToken) BeginCreateOrUpdateBackupLongTermRetentionVaultAsync(String, String, String, BackupLongTermRetentionVaultCreateOrUpdateParameters, CancellationToken)

Edit

Begins creating or updating an Azure SQL Server backup LongTermRetention vault. To determine the status of the operation call GetBackupLongTermRetentionVaultOperationStatus.

Task<BackupLongTermRetentionVaultCreateOrUpdateResponse> BeginCreateOrUpdateBackupLongTermRetentionVaultAsync(string resourceGroupName, string serverName, string backupLongTermRetentionVaultName, BackupLongTermRetentionVaultCreateOrUpdateParameters parameters, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Function BeginCreateOrUpdateBackupLongTermRetentionVaultAsync(resourceGroupName As String, serverName As String, backupLongTermRetentionVaultName As String, parameters As BackupLongTermRetentionVaultCreateOrUpdateParameters, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task(Of BackupLongTermRetentionVaultCreateOrUpdateResponse)
Parameters
resourceGroupName
String String

The name of the Resource Group to which the Azure SQL Server belongs.

serverName
String String

The name of the Azure SQL Server on which the database is hosted.

backupLongTermRetentionVaultName
String String

The name of the Azure SQL Server backup LongTermRetention vault.

parameters
BackupLongTermRetentionVaultCreateOrUpdateParameters BackupLongTermRetentionVaultCreateOrUpdateParameters

The required parameters for creating or updating a backup LongTermRetention vault.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns
Task<BackupLongTermRetentionVaultCreateOrUpdateResponse> Task(Of BackupLongTermRetentionVaultCreateOrUpdateResponse)

Response for long running Azure operations.

Edit

Begins creating or updating an Azure SQL Server backup LongTermRetention policy. To determine the status of the operation call GetDatabaseBackupLongTermRetentionPolicyOperationStatus.
